title: Login Error
body: About 2 days ago I was playing League and then I randomly disconnected from the PVP Servers. I tried to re login multiple times but it did not work. I had then decided to check out the server status but it had said that everything was online. I reattempted today and I had gotten the same results. The error of logging in. I am not sure what is happening and i'm not sure if it's on my side or ya'll side. It would be nice to get a response ASAP. Thank You.

replies.body:
I don't see any recorded issues with the login server from our side, so I suspect this may be caused by a local setting our routing issue along the way to the server. As a first step, I recommend checking our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a consolidated list of steps that commonly resolve this issue.

If those steps caused any change, let me know.
